PractitionerExtendedQuery

QUERY: PractitionerExtendedQuery

The official URL for this operation definition is: 

http://hl7.org/fhir/ca-bc/provider/OperationDefinition/bc-extended-practitioner-query

URL: [base]/Practitioner/$extendedQuery

URL: [base]/Practitioner/[id]/$extendedQuery

Parameters

UseNameCardinalityTypeBindingDocumentation
INsurname0..1string
(string)

Search for practitioners with the specified surname.

INgiven-name0..1string
(string)

Search for practitioners with the specified given name.

INstatus0..1string
(token)

Search for practitioners with a license that has the specified status.

INaddress-city0..1string
(string)

Search for practitioners with an address that includes the given city.

INgender0..1string
(token)

Search for practitioners with the specified gender.

INrole0..1string
(token)

Search for practitioners that have an associated PractitionerRole code with the specified value.

INlanguage0..1string
(token)

Search for practitioners who can communicate with the specified language code.

INexpertise0..1string
(token)

Search for practitioners with a qualification that matches the specified expertise.

INstatus-reason0..1string
(token)

Search for practitioners with a license that has the specified status reason.
